mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART( USER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, QUANTITY, TOTAL_PRICE ) VALUES( #{user_no}, #{product_no}, #{product_name}, #{quantity}, #{total_price} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.cart_no, a.user_no, a.product_no, a.product_name, a.product_size, a.product_color, a.quantity, a.total_price, b.delivery_fee, b.discount, b.discount_rate FROM CART AS A JOIN PRODUCT AS B on a.product_no = b.product_no and user_no = 1;
